data.representation.sparse

Class BOWInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataInstance
      • data.representation.sparse.BOWInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BOWInstance
extends DataInstance
    This class implements a data holder for sparse data like documents, in a bag of words format.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        word - String that is the word to insert.

      • addWord

        public void addWord(int index,
           float count)
        Simply adds the count of occurrences of the index to the internal map.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the word to add, from the corpus vocabulary.
        count - Float count of the occurrences to add.

      • setWordWeight

        public void setWordWeight(int index,
                 float count)
        Overwrites any previous count entries for this word index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the word to set, from the corpus vocabulary.
        count - Float count of the occurrences to set.

      • addWord

        public void addWord(java.lang.String word,
           int count)
        Inserts the word in the corpus if it doesn't already exist there and then inserts the appropriate index from the vocabulary to the internal map, followed by the provided count. If a count already exist, the two are summed.
        Parameters:
        word - String that is the word to insert.
        count - Float count of the occurrences to add.

      • getWordFrequency

        public float getWordFrequency(int index)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The occurrence count of the word in this sparse representation.
